Wed Nov 29 15:40:21 PST 2017

  * Add support for ft.com. Three new tabs: equities, funds, and ETFs

unzip hleOfxQuotes-Build_20171129_139.zip to get

hleOfxQuotes-Build_20171129_139-app-exec.jar

Need Java 1.8

java -jar hleOfxQuotes-Build_20171129_139-app-exec.jar
  Use symbols from ft.com
  Choose appropriate tab: equities, funds, or ETFs
